quote: Focusing is the great secret of power. If you want to use your full amount of focus, you must close down all other thought and direct your power of generating mental steam toward one outcome.
author: Stephen Richards,  The Ultimate Focus Builder

quote: FOCUS = Follow On Course Until Successful.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: All profound distraction opens certain doors. You have to allow yourself to be distracted when you are unable to concentrate.
author: Julio Cortázar,  Around the Day in Eighty Worlds

quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
author: Mark Twain,  A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court

quote: To find a focus, learn to love and dream.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It takes drive and focus to move from potential to reality.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
author: George Lucas

quote: When your drive is moving your purpose, focus must hold the wheels else your might miss the way. And do you know what that means? Avoid Crash!!!. Stay focused!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Sometimes we can focus so much on nothing that we make it a big something of nothing
author: Ricky Maye,  An Emerging Spirituality

quote: You cannot run at full throttle when applying your mindset to all of the different things running through your head. Focusing is the key to manifesting your desires.
author: Stephen Richards,  The Ultimate Focus Builder

quote: A focused Mind is a result Of a little Effort To tell Your Distractions To sleep for A couple of hours While you are at WORK.
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
author: John Carmack

quote: The direction of your focus is the direction your life will move. Let yourself move toward what is good, valuable, strong and true.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you’re doing.
author: Leo Babauta

quote: Perception is strong and sight weak. In strategy it is important to see distant things as if they were close and to take a distanced view of close things.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: You become what you focus on and dream about.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Aim higher in case you fall short.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

quote: Just let go of the need to care about whether it happens or not, then you are free from fear and can then concentrate on focusing.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Aim high, aim at the highest, and all lower aims are thereby achieved. It is looking below on the stormy sea of differences that makes you sink. Look up, beyond these and see the One Glorious Real, and you are saved.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: When you are up against a wall, put down roots like a tree, until clarity comes from deeper sources to see over that wall and grow.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: It's the mind that sees, not eyes.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
author: Robertson Davies,  Tempest-Tost

quote: View life through a wide angle lens attitude and see your horizons broaden.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Give your life purpose and focus. Position yourself to succeed
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Believe more deeply. Hold your face up to the light,even though for the moment you do not see.
author: Bill Wilson

quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The more he identifies with the dominant images of need, the less he understands his own life and his own desires. The spectacle’s estrangement from the acting subject is expressed by the fact that the individual’s gestures are no longer his own; they are the gestures of someone else who represents them to him.
author: Guy Debord,  The Society of the Spectacle

quote: It is in the quiet that you gain perspective when you have to deal with the loud.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: I don't judge people. It blurs out the center of my attention,my focus, myself.
author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: All beautiful distractions, ignites from you.
author: V.S. Atbay

quote: One eye sees, the other feels.
author: Paul Klee

quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: I believe in spectacles, but I think eyes necessary too.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: The spectacle is at the same time the mirage of self in the mirror of things.
author: Paul Ricoeur

quote: Bring the mind into sharp focus and make it alert so that it can immediately intuit truth, which is everywhere. The mind must be emancipated from old habits, prejudices, restrictive thought processes and even ordinary thought itself.
author: Bruce Lee,  Tao of Jeet Kune Do

quote: With words at your disposal, you can see more clearly. Finding the words is another step in learning to see.
author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

quote: You are an aperture through which the universe is looking at and exploring itself.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: Directing the mind to stay in the present can be a formidable task.
author: Allan Lokos,  Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Dive again and again into the river of uncertainty. Create in the dark, only then can you recognize the light.
author: Jyrki Vainonen

quote: see beyond the eyes can see, believe beyond the inspiration!
author: Felix Y. Siauw,  Beyond The Inspiration

quote: They say: Think twice before you jump. I say: Jump first and then think as much as you want!
author: Osho,  Courage: The Joy of Living Dangerously

quote: My aim is to put down on paper what I see and what I feel in the best and simplest way.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: When indeed you positively press your face, so to speak, against the crystalline window of your eyes, your mind is apt to become a perfect vacuum.("Out Of The Deep")
author: Walter de la Mare,  Great Tales of Terror and the Supernatural

quote: When you're in the muck you can only see muck. If you somehow manage to float above it, you still see the muck but you see it from a different perspective. And you see other things too. That's the consolation of philosophy.
author: David Cronenberg

quote: Stay focus on what God has assigned me to do. Keep my mind on what I am doing/
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Live your vision and demand your success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: In the high country of the mind one has to become adjusted to the thinner air of uncertainty...
author: Robert M. Pirsig
